result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: FOR ATTY FEES. DE to pay $50/mo comm 11/1/22. PPF waived. DE signed Pet for Appt of Atty & will be mailed an Order for Pymt. kma

9:29 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Defendant Justin Michael Robotka in court.  Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. REcess at 9:30 am for DE to fill out a PFAC. Back on at 9:43 am. Def files a PFAC. Court orders $50/mo starting October 1. Court to appoint an attorney and will mail def correspondence.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on November 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

1:54 PM CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Jeremiah Harrelson in court for Defendant for today. Defendant Justin Michael Robotka appeared by video, in custody. DE confirms address and DOB. DE understands charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. DE doesn't qualify for PD- PFAC given. Bond argument. PO Hold. Court orders bond. Court sets STC and finds good cause to exceed time limits.  gll
Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Status conference on September 29, 2022 at 09:15 am.
